projects.name: Web Platform for Educational Offerings in Chiapas
projects.Project_Overview: This project aimed to create a centralized web platform to help students in Chiapas explore university programs with ease. The platform provides a structured database with detailed information on degree programs, admission requirements, costs, and institutional details. It offers intuitive search and filtering options, allowing students to compare different programs efficiently. Additionally, the platform enhances accessibility by enabling students to download academic plans and set reminders for key enrollment deadlines.
projects.description: Development of a web platform for students to search and explore university programs in Chiapas, providing a centralized source of detailed information on degrees, admission criteria, and costs. The platform includes key features for students such as search and filtering options, program details, admission requirements, cost breakdowns, and contact information.
responsibilities: Design and implement the user interface using React with Vite.
Develop secure RESTful APIs with PHP CodeIgniter 4, including password hash mechanisms and protected routes.
Design scalable endpoints to handle public statistics and administrative operations.
Implement pagination in the endpoints to optimize performance with over 1,000 universities.
Ensure data standardization to enable effective comparison of educational programs.
Implement tools for students to download academic plans and institutional profiles in PDF format.
Develop features for students to set reminders for important dates such as enrollment deadlines and exams.
achievements: Significant reduction in system response time thanks to pagination.
Improved accessibility of educational information for students in Chiapas.
Successful implementation of a centralized platform, reducing the time students spend searching for educational opportunities.
Increased student awareness of the range of educational options available in Chiapas.
Development of an intuitive system allowing students to compare educational programs side-by-side, aiding informed decision-making.

projects.name: Administrative System for University Programs
projects.Project_Overview: This system was developed to help university administrators manage academic program data more efficiently. It allows the creation, modification, and deletion of institution and program-related information while also facilitating the generation of statistical reports. The system enhances administrative workflows by providing an intuitive interface for non-technical users, ensuring data accuracy, and promoting engagement between institutions and prospective students.
projects.description: The administrative module was designed for administrators to manage university data, including creating, modifying, and deleting information related to institutions, programs, and other relevant data. This system also facilitates the generation of general usage statistics, ensuring effective data management.
responsibilities: Backend development using CodeIgniter 4 with MVC architecture.
Designing the admin interface with Bootstrap for a responsive and accessible layout.
Creating secure RESTful APIs for data insertion and retrieval.

The module 'Web Platform for Educational Offerings in Chiapas' made with React was integrated into the CodeIgniter project, functioning only as a pre-built view, making use of both Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS within the same project.
Developing a system for generating general usage statistics.
Implementing functionalities for administrators to manage academic programs, promotions, and updates.
Ensuring the accuracy and timely updates of educational data within the platform.
Monitoring key performance metrics and gathering user feedback to improve platform usability.
achievements: An efficient and secure system streamlining administrative tasks for university staff.
An intuitive interface that facilitated interaction for non-technical users.
A platform allowing institutions to easily manage their academic programs, promotions, and updates, reducing reliance on manual processes.
A system that allows administrators to generate reports displaying the number of visits to each university within the system.
A centralized system for managing data to ensure information is current, contributing to the reduction of academic lag in Chiapas.
Enhanced institutional engagement, with universities actively updating and maintaining their program information.
A significant increase in platform adoption and student usage, improving access to education-related data.
